body.p: Before issuing an IFRS or an amendment to an IFRS, the Board seeks to ensure that it will meet a significant need and that the overall benefits of the resulting information will justify the costs of providing it. The Board issued Offsetting Financial Assets and Financial Liabilities (Amendments to IAS 32) to eliminate inconsistencies in the application of the offsetting criteria in paragraph 42 of IAS 32 by clarifying the meaning of ‘currently has a legally enforceable right of set‑off’ and that some gross settlement systems may be considered equivalent to net settlement.
